title: The Old Road
description: [Characters] sit inside the stagecoach, travelling down the old road towards the Hamlet for the first time, about to start their long quest. The party should still be in the stagecoach, surrounded by the old grizzled trees of the old road, the Hamlet still not in sight. This is the prologue, and the characters aren't yet fully aware of the horrors that await them.

title: Crash
description: Travelling down the old road, the stagecoach crashes, abruptly ending the journey. The Caretaker, who was driving, mysteriously disappears. [Characters] assess their injuries and begin making their way to the Hamlet by foot. This is the prologue, and the characters aren't yet fully aware of the horrors that await them.

title: Send these vermin a message
description: On their way to the Hamlet on foot, after the Stagecoach crashed and the Caretaker vanished, [Characters] encounter [Enemies] and prepare for attack. Set the stage for the battle, but don't start it yet.
keywords: Send these vermin a message. The rightful owners has returned, and their kind is no longer welcome!

title: Vanquished
description: After defeating [Enemies] encountered on the old road, [Characters] pause to assess the situation. Narrate their post-battle conversation—whether relieved, hostile, or weary—and their actions as they continue their journey towards the Hamlet on foot.

title: The way is shut
description: Approaching the Hamlet's outskirts, [Characters] discover a ravaged tent. As they loot and investigate, [Enemies] emerge from the shadows, blocking the path forward. The final obstacle before sanctuary reveals itself. Set the stage for the battle, but don't start it yet.
keywords: Courage in the face of danger

title: The Hamlet
description: Having overcome the perils of the old road on foot, [Characters] finally arrive at the Hamlet's edge, where the stagecoach clearing marks the boundary between wilderness and civilization. The Caretaker is inexplicably here, his explanations for his disappearance incoherent and unsettling. The tangle of narrow streets and leaning buildings sprawls before them - their quest truly begins here.

title: The Announcement
description: In the town square beneath the Ancestor's weathered statue, [Characters] gather as the Town Crier rings the bell to summon what remains of the Hamlet's population. The Ancestor's stone gaze watches from above as the twin heirs step forward to claim their inheritance and announce their intent to reclaim the estate.
